org.jboss.windup.graph.model

Interface ProjectModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.frames.VertexFrame, WindupVertexFrame
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MavenProjectModel, ProjectWithUnparsablesModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectModel.Impl

    public interface ProjectModel
extends WindupVertexFrame
    Base interface representing an abstract project model with a project name, version, type, and location on disk. Projects may be source-based or binary based. Additional models may extend this to support additional project types (eg, Maven-based projects).
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler

      • getRootProjectModel

        ProjectModel getRootProjectModel()
        Returns the project model that represents the whole application. If this projectModel is the root projectModel, it will return it.
        Returns:
        ProjectModel representing the whole application
